html: willing and obedient/eat the good of the land. God made this same promise to us: "The willing and obedient shall eat the good of the land of Zion in these last days. And the rebellious shall be cut off out of the land of Zion, and shall be sent away, and shall not inherit the land" (D&C 64:34-35). These words recall the oft- recurring Book of Mormon statement that "inasmuch as ye shall keep the commandments of God ye shall prosper in the land; and…inasmuch as ye will not keep the commandments of God ye shall be cut off from his presence" (Alma 36:30).
